_return.description: Whether or not the key is down

doc.name: keyIsDown

arguments.name: k
arguments.description: The keyboard key to check as a key global, or a string

doc.description: Check if a keyboard key is pressed, returns true if key is down and returns false if it's not

examples.source:
-- Use a string 
if (keyIsDown('a')) then
  -- key 'a' is down
end

-- use a global
if (keyIsDown(LEFT_ARROW)) then
  -- left arrow is down
end
